column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ Police detained a Chinese man in connection with a car theft in Sihanoukville.------A report from the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Gendarmerie stated that at 10:35 pm on 23 October 2019
column4: police received a report of the theft a HUMMER from Village 5
column6: Sihanoukville made by a 38 year old Chinese man. ------An investigation into the case led to the recovery of the car and the arrest of suspect
column8: a 24-year-old Chinese casino worker.------The suspect is currently being questioned.------ POST NEWS
